Functions
Draw_Line
void Draw_Line(
UX x1,
UY y1,
UX x2,
UY y2,
u8 color,
u8 op
)

Draw a line (pixel unit)

Parameters
x1
UX

Source position X

y1
UY

Source position Y

x2
UX

Destination position X

y2
UY

Destination position Y

color
u8

Draw color (format depends of the screen mode)

op
u8

Draw operator (VDP_OP_AND, VDP_OP_OR, ...)
